https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/16OcuuW5z509WILR6BmscNdXgw0.jpg Through a series of misunderstandings, Alvin, Simon and Theodore come to believe that Dave is going to propose to his new girlfriend in New York City - and dump them. They have three days to get to him and stop the proposal. Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
